column6: The secret is out--Eric O'Grady is Ant-Man and S.H.I.E.L.D. is not happy! Eric's career as a S.H.I.E.L.D. agent is about to come to an abrupt and violent end. How did Eric become a homeless peeping tom Ant-Man shortly after the events of CIVIL WAR?
column8: | colorist:Bill Crabtree | penciller (cover):Phil Hester | writer:Robert Kirkman | inker:Ande Parks | letterer:Rus Wooton
